text: The Eagle Has Landed is a 1976 British World War II adventure thriller movie directed by John Sturges and based on the 1975 novel of the same name by Jack Higgins. It stars Michael Caine, Donald Sutherland, Robert Duvall, Treat Williams, Larry Hagman, Jenny Agutter, Donald Pleasence, Jean Marsh, Anthony Quayle and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 thriller movies Category:1976 adventure movies Category:1976 war movies Category:British adventure movies Category:British thriller movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Sturges Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Eagle Has Landed
